import{useEffect,useRef,useState}from"react";import styles from"./stack-animation.module.css";import imageone from"../../images/stack/file-type-html.902x1024.png";import imagetwo from"../../images/stack/javascript-js.1024x1024.png";import imagethree from"../../images/stack/react.1024x911.png";import imagefour from"../../images/stack/net-logo.png";import imagefive from"../../images/stack/c-sharp-logo.png";import imagesix from"../../images/stack/python-logo.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StackAnimation=()=>{const imagebg=useRef();const changetxt=useRef();const changetext=[['HTML5'],['JavaScript'],['Reactjs'],['Dotnet'],['C#'],['Python']];const images=[imageone,imagetwo,imagethree,imagefour,imagefive,imagesix];const colors=['#264653','#a59636','#73a4ac','#e0e0e0','#eccaff','#00509d'];const textcolor=['#F16529','#F8E018','#9ee1ec','#ffffff','#a663cc','#ffffff'];const[image,setimage]=useState(imageone);const[textone,settextone]=useState(changetext[0][0]);const[currentTextColor,setCurrentTextColor]=useState(textcolor[0]);// Track the current text color

timeoutFadeIn=setTimeout(()=>{setfade(true);},4000);// Update image, text, and background
timeoutUpdate=setTimeout(()=>{const nextIndex=currentimageindex===finalindex?0:currentimageindex+1;setimage(images[nextIndex]);settextone(changetext[nextIndex][0]);setCurrentTextColor(textcolor[nextIndex]);// Update text color state
if(imagebg.current){imagebg.current.style.backgroundColor=colors[nextIndex];}},5000);// Trigger fade-in effect
timeoutFadeOut=setTimeout(()=>{setfade(false);},6000);return()=>{clearTimeout(timeoutFadeIn);clearTimeout(timeoutUpdate);clearTimeout(timeoutFadeOut);};},[image]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.homesearchparent,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.homesearch_main,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.homesearchinputcontainter,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:changetxt,className:styles.changetext,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:`${styles.innertext} ${fade?styles.fadedownup:''}`,style:{color:currentTextColor}// Use inline style for color
,children:textone})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.bannerimage_holder,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:`${styles.bannerimage} ${fade?styles.fadedownup:''}`,src:image,alt:"banner image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:imagebg,className:styles.image_background})]})]})})});};export default StackAnimation;
